Forms.Name: CMC Confirmation
Forms.Html: Thank you for choosing Campus University. One of our admissions counselor will contact you shortly. You can also reach out to our Admissions Office at:

Forms.Name: FB_Lead
Forms.Title: Request for Information

Must be defined in a Renderer CSS file.","ValidationRules":"[ { "ruleScope" : "self", "ruleMethod" : "matchRegex", "validationType": "Error", "regex": "^(?:|[a-z][a-z0-9-_]*(?:\\s+[a-z][a-z0-9-_]*)*)$", "modifiers": "i", "message": "A single-space separated list of class names was expected for Class" } ]"},{"Name":"Disabled","DisplayName":"Disabled","Value":"false","IsEditable":true,"IsVisible":true,"EditType":"Text","EditDropdownListValues":null,"EditQuery":null,"PropertyHelp":"Sets a control to disabled. Must be true or false, or a binding beginning with "vm.models.". A property array string index requires single quotes. e.g. vm.models.xxx.CustomProperties['yyyyy']. An expression can be used that evaluates to true or false. e.g. vm.models.myvalue==7 (>,<,!=,==,>=,<=). If comparing to a string, it must be in single quotes. (true and false must be all lowercase)","ValidationRules":"[ { "ruleScope" : "self", "ruleMethod" : "matchRegex", "validationType": "Error", "explanation": "true or false or a standard vm.models.", "compileKey": "booleanRule1", "regex": "^(?:true|false|(?:\\(*\\s*.*vm\\.models\\..+\\s*))$", "message": "The Disabled property must be "true", "false" or must be a boolean bound value and contain "vm.models." with a unique argument name suffix. Allowable characters: starts with letter, then letters, numerals or underscore. A property array string index requires single quotes. e.g. vm.models.xxx.CustomProperties['yyyyy']." }, { "ruleScope" : "self", "ruleMethod" : "jsepParser", "validationType": "ErrorNoPrefix", "explanation": "Uses the jsep parser to parse the expression", "message": "< This message is dynamic and constructed on the fly >" } ]"},{"Name":"Filter","DisplayName":"Filter Type","Value":"contains","IsEditable":true,"IsVisible":true,"EditType":"DropdownList","EditDropdownListValues":"startswith,endswith,contains","EditQuery":null,"PropertyHelp":"Choose from supported filter types. Value typed with keyboard will be used to filter the list according to the selection.","ValidationRules":null},{"Name":"Id","DisplayName":"Id","Value":"LeadCampus","IsEditable":true,"IsVisible":true,"EditType":"Text","EditDropdownListValues":null,"EditQuery":null,"PropertyHelp":"Id is required. Can be any valid javascript id attribute value. (Must start with a letter followed by 0 to 9, a to z, dash or underscore characters). Using a GUID from GuidGen or GuidGenerator prefixed by at least one letter prevents a clash with any other id. Id should not have spaces. Binding is not supported for this property.","ValidationRules":"[ { "ruleScope" : "self", "ruleMethod" : "matchRegex", "validationType": "Error", "regex": "^(?:[a-z][0-9a-z_-]*)$", "modifiers": "i", "explanation": "Starts with a letter, followed by any character 0 to 9, a-z, underscore or dash. The modifiers specifies ignore case.", "message": "The Id property must be specified. It cannot be blank or have spaces. Can be any number of characters starting with a letter, followed 0 to 9, a to z (upper or lower case) , dash or underscore. Binding is not supported for this property. Using a GUID from GuidGen or GuidGenerator prefixed by at least one letter prevents a clash with any other id." } ]"},{"Name":"DisplayName","DisplayName":"Label","Value":"Campus Location","IsEditable":true,"IsVisible":true,"EditType":"Text","EditDropdownListValues":null,"EditQuery":null,"PropertyHelp":"The value displayed in the label. If this value is bound, it must be enclosed in double braces. e.g. {{vm.models.myLabel}}. Allowable suffix characters: starts with letter, then letters, numerals or underscore.","ValidationRules":"[ { "ruleScope" : "self", "ruleMethod" : "matchRegex", "validationType": "Warning", "compileKey": "modelWithBraces", "regex": "^(?:|[^{].*|{{vm\\.models(?:\\.[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]*(?:\\[\\d+\\]){0,2})+(?:\\.CustomProperties\\['.+'\\](?:\\[\\d+\\]){0,2}|\\.MultiValueCustomProperties\\['.+'\\](?:\\[\\d+\\]){0,2}){0,1}}})$", "explanation": "Not required, or any string excluding one starting with {, or must start with {{vm.models.. Then any letter, followed by any character in a to z, 0 to 9 or underscore, 0 or more occurrences. If a CustomProperties or a MultiValueCustomProperties, it follows 3 words (vm.models.xxx.). All can have up to two array indexers", "message": "If Label property is specified, it can be any string. If it is bound it must begin with {{vm.models. and end with }}. Allowable suffix characters: starts with letter, then letters, numerals or underscore." }, { "ruleScope" : "self", "ruleMethod" : "cannotStartWithRegex", "validationType": "Warning", "regex": "^vm.models\\..*$", "explanation": "Cannot be bare vm.models. binding because it must start with {{ and end with }}", "message": "If Label property is bound, it must start with {{vm.models., and end with }}. Allowable suffix characters: starts with letter, then letters, numerals or underscore." } ]"},{"Name":"LookupQueryDisplayColumn","DisplayName":"Lookup Display Member","Value":"Name","IsEditable":true,"IsVisible":true,"EditType":"Text","EditDropdownListValues":null,"EditQuery":null,"PropertyHelp":"The name of the property in the OData query string to use for display.","ValidationRules":"[ { "ruleScope" : "depender", "ruleMethod" : "containedInDependee", "explanation": "Validates that the value used here, appears in the Lookup Query", "dependee":"LookupQueryName", "validationType": "Warning", "message": "The LookUp Display Member must be contained within the Lookup Query." } ]"},{"Name":"LookupQueryName","DisplayName":"Lookup Query","Value":"Teams?$select=TeamId,Name&$filter=NavigationTeamType/DisplayValue eq 'Campus'&$orderby=Name","IsEditable":true,"IsVisible":true,"EditType":"TextArea","EditDropdownListValues":null,"EditQuery":null,"PropertyHelp":"OData query string to retrieve values for the control.","ValidationRules":"[ { "ruleScope" : "dependee", "ruleMethod" : "requiredDependers", "explanation": "This validation is necessarily done in code. The Lookup Query $select must contain the values used in the dependers properties", "dependers": "LookupQueryValueColumn,LookupQueryDisplayColumn", "validationType": "Warning", "message": "Properties dependent on this property are not set correctly. Correct either this query or the properties (Lookup Value Member,Lookup Display Member) that use the OData query select properties." }, { "ruleScope" : "dependee", "ruleMethod" : "optionalDependers", "explanation": "This validation is necessarily done in code. The Lookup Query $select must contain the values used in the dependers property, if it is specified.", "dependers": "LookupQuerySortColumn", "validationType": "Warning", "message": "A property dependent on this property is not set correctly. Correct either this query or the property (Lookup Sort Member) that use the OData query select properties." } ]"},{"Name":"LookupQuerySortColumn","DisplayName":"Lookup Sort Member","Value":"Name","IsEditable":true,"IsVisible":true,"EditType":"Text","EditDropdownListValues":null,"EditQuery":null,"PropertyHelp":"The name of the property (or comma separated list of properties) in an OData query string to sort on. Default is to use the OData query order. This applies only to a top level select.","ValidationRules":"[ { "ruleScope" : "depender", "ruleMethod" : "containedInDependeeIfSpecified", "explanation": "Validates that the value used here, appears in the Lookup Query", "dependee":"LookupQueryName", "validationType": "Warning", "message": "The LookUp Sort Member(s) must be contained within the Lookup Query. This property cannot be a dotted property name." } ]"},{"Name":"LookupQueryValueColumn","DisplayName":"Lookup Value Member","Value":"TeamId","IsEditable":true,"IsVisible":true,"EditType":"Text","EditDropdownListValues":null,"EditQuery":null,"PropertyHelp":"The name of the property in the OData query string to use as the value.","ValidationRules":"[ { "ruleScope" : "depender", "ruleMethod" : "containedInDependee", "explanation": "Validates that the value used here, appears in the Lookup Query", "dependee":"LookupQueryName", "validationType": "Warning", "message": "The LookUp Value Member must be contained within the Lookup Query." } ]"},{"Name":"Model","DisplayName":"Model","Value":"vm.models.lead.Campus","IsEditable":true,"IsVisible":true,"EditType":"Text","EditDropdownListValues":null,"EditQuery":null,"PropertyHelp":"Model is required for binding to a workflow argument or another control. "vm.models." is the standard prefix it must start with.
This value may initialize the control, and may be updated by the control,
and if matched to a workflow argument, is available in the workflow (readable or writable).
Ensure your model argument is defined in your workflow for custom components if it is used in the workflow. Otherwise a workflow argument is not required.
The casing of an argument used in the workflow must match the "vm.models." suffix casing.
If the model addresses CustomProperties or MultiValueCustomProperties, the property identifier string must be enclosed in single quotes.
e.g. vm.models.myentity.CustomProperties['mycustomprop']","ValidationRules":"[ { "ruleScope" : "self", "ruleMethod" : "matchRegex", "validationType": "Error", "compileKey": "standardModel", "regex": "^(?:vm\\.models(?:\\.[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]*(?:\\[\\d+\\]){0,2})+(?:\\.CustomProperties\\['.+'\\](?:\\[\\d+\\]){0,2}|\\.MultiValueCustomProperties\\['.+'\\](?:\\[\\d+\\]){0,2}){0,1})$", "explanation": "Must start with vm.models.. Then any letter, followed by any character in a to z, 0 to 9 or underscore, 0 or more. If a CustomProperties or a MultiValueCustomProperties, it follows 3 words (vm.models.xxx.). All can have up to two array indexers", "message": "The required Model binding must start with "vm.models." with a unique argument name suffix. Allowable characters: starts with letter, then letters, numerals or underscore. The suffix may also contain a CustomProperties or MultiValueCustomProperties single quoted string selector. e.g. vm.models.myentity.CustomProperties['mycustomprop']." } ]"},{"Name":"OptionLabel","DisplayName":"Option
